content: bobble chart instructions designed by kari philpott kuddly kreations by kari these charts were designed with the intent to combine them with other charts and put them together to make a blanket or any other item of your choice materials worsted weight yarn in color s of choice h-hook or hook of choice chart s of choice stitches used single_crochet bobble stitch-- work 4dc in same st leaving 5 loops on the hook by omitting the last step in each double_crochet pulling yarn through last two loops yarn over and draw yarn through all 5 loops essentially you are doing a 4 double_crochet decrease in the same stitch notes -you will initially chain 30 -each square is one stitch -the colored squares will be done in the bobble stitch -the white squares will be done in single_crochet -start in the bottom right corner of the chart if right-handed and bottom left corner of the chart if left-handed instructions chain 30 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd from hook and across 29 sts row 2-31 chain 1 follow chart doing a single_crochet for the white squares and a bobble for the colored squares 29 sts row 32 chain 1 single_crochet across 29 sts
